statements: SELECT log_id, user_id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM conversation_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT log_id, user_id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM conversation_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC
SELECT log_id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE message LIKE '%important%' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM conversation_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING last_activity >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversation_logs;
SELECT user_id, message_text FROM chatbot_conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT message_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, engagement_score FROM marketing_content_logs WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM marketing_content_logs WHERE engagement_score > 0.8 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text FROM chatbot_conversation_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, engagement_score FROM marketing_content_logs WHERE engagement_score > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversation_logs WHERE user_id IN (54321, 67890) ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, engagement_score FROM marketing_content_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM chatbot_users;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT title, content, release_date FROM marketing_content ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time, conversation_text FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM chatbot_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_content WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT title, content FROM marketing_content ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time, conversation_text FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_conversations FROM chatbot_conversations GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_conversations > 5
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, content, type FROM marketing_content WHERE type = 'video' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT keyword FROM keywords WHERE category = 'Technology' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM conversation_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT name, email, subscription_status FROM user_details WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM marketing_content WHERE type = 'video' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE conversation_id = 'abc123'
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC
SELECT content_id, title, category FROM marketing_content WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_created ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 0.8
SELECT content_id, category FROM marketing_content WHERE category = 'promotions'
